name: surface_radioactivity_content_of_218At
description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "At" means the element "astatine" and "218At" is the isotope "astatine-218" with a half-life of 2.31e-05 days.
